description:
Hazuki reveals yet another hidden talent: the ability to suppress her presence. In her absolute stillness, Kouhei finds the perfect subject for his photography. Unfortunately, Hazuki’s self-doubt soon creeps in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, I Must Have Cat-ear Buns from Furufuru-do
I Have to Eat Cat-Ear Buns!
Onii-sama, Doushite mo Furufuru Dou no Nekomimi Manjuu Janakucha Dame Nandesu
おにいさま, どうしてもフルフル堂のネコミミ饅頭じゃなくちゃだめなんです
